--- Comment #2 from Mathias Panzenböck <grosser meister morti gmx net>
2009-02-08 20:22:16 --- I looked at the source in order to fix this bug (yes its a bug, well a regression - it worked once (1.x) but does not work anymore). However, I could not find my way through the source because there seem to be creation date fields at some level (create tables) but not on another (class SqlTrack). And on yet another level these fields (creation date/modification date) seem to be abused as firstPlayed/lastPlayed (if I understand the code right - it's not documented). But those fields are something totally different. The creation date I want to use *before* the first time I play the song in order to find the new song and then play it.
body.para: What I'm trying to say is: I'm willing to add such a feature but only if amaroks source gets proper documentation because with the current state of the source documentation I just cant figure out what I have to change or - more importantly - what is safe/right to change and what not and how are certain fields meant do be used and so on.
